com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller

Class ActionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.ui.controller.ActionController

  • public class ActionController
extends java.lang.Object
    A session scoped, managed bean for user interfaces related to Action
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Arjumand Fatima <09bicseafatima@seecs.edu.pk>

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActionAttribute> actionAttributeList
      An ArrayList of ActionAttribute used to display all the existing ActionAttribute(s) stored in the database.
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActAttrValues> actionAttributeValueList
      An ArrayList of ActAttrValues used to display all the existing ActAttrValues(s) stored in the database.
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Action> actionList
      An ArrayList of Action used to display all the existing Actions stored in the database.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Action selectedAction
      An instance of Action used to store the Action selected by the user from the user interface.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActionAttribute selectedActionAttributes
      An instance of ActionAttribute used to store the ActionAttribute selected by the user from the user interface.
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActAttrValues selectedActionAttributeValue
      An instance of ActAttrValues used to store the ActAttrValues selected by the user from the user interface.

      ActionController() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addAction()
      Opens the /System Learning/Action/Add/AddAction.xhtml page for creating a new Action instance.
      void addActionAttribute()
      Opens the /System Learning/Action/Add/AddActionAttributeDialog.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of adding a new instance of @{code ActionAttribute} corresponding to an existing Action instance.
      void addActionAttributeValue()
      Opens the /System Learning/Action/Add/AddActionAttributeValueDialog.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of adding a new ActAttrValues instance corresponding to an @{code ActionAttribute} of an Action instance.
      void cancelAddActionAttribute()
      Cancels the operation of adding an existing ActionAttribute instance corresponding to an existing Action instance.
      void cancelAddActionAttributeValue()
      Cancels the operation of adding a new ActAttrValues corresponding to an existing ActionAttribute instance
      void cancelUpdateAction()
      Cancels the operation of updating an existing Action instance.
      void cancelUpdateActionAttribute()
      Cancels the operation of updating an existing ActionAttribute instance.
      void cancelUpdateActionAttributeValue()
      Cancels the operation of updating an existing ActAttrValues instance.
      void deleteAction()
      Deletes the instance of Action stored in selectedAction property
      void deleteActionAttribute()
      Deletes an instance of ActionAttribute stored in selectedActionAttributes property
      void deleteActionAttributeValue()
      Deletes the instance of ActAttrValues stored in selectedActionAttributeValue property
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActionAttribute> getActionAttributeList()
      Returns the value of actionAttributeList property corresponding to the selectedAction
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActAttrValues> getActionAttributeValueList()
      Returns the value of actionAttributeValueList property
      java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Action> getActionList()
      Returns the ArrayList of Action instances available.
      ActionDAO getDaoAction()
      Returns the value of daoAction property
      ActionAttributeDAO getDaoActionAttribute()
      Returns the value of daoActionAttribute property
      ActAttrValuesDAO getDaoActionAttributeValue()
      Returns the value of daoActionAttributeValue property
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getDataTypeList()
      Returns the value of dataTypeList property
      java.lang.String getNewAttributeName()
      Returns the value of newAttributeName property
      java.lang.String getNewAttributeValue()
      Returns the value of newAttributeValue property
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Action getSelectedAction()
      Returns the value of selectedAction property
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActionAttribute getSelectedActionAttributes()
      Returns the value of selectedActionAttributes property
      com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActAttrValues getSelectedActionAttributeValue()
      Returns the value of selectedActionAttributeValue property
      java.lang.String getSelectedDataType()
      Returns the value of selectedDataType property
      boolean isAttrbtn()
      Returns FALSE if an instance of the Action is selected by the user otherwise TRUE.
      boolean isAttrValuebtn()
      Returns FALSE if an instance of ActionAttribute is selected by the user otherwise TRUE.
      boolean isOperationFail()
      Returns FALSE if a Save button was pressed otherwise TRUE.
      void onActionAttributeUnSelect()
      Disables the button for adding ActAttrValues instance corresponding to an existing ActionAttribute instance.
      void onActionSelect()
      Disables the button for adding ActAttrValues instance and enables the button for adding ActionAttribute instance whenever an Action instance is selected.
      void onActionUnSelect()
      Disables the buttons for adding ActionAttribute and ActAttrValues instances corresponding to an existing Action instance.
      void saveAddActionAttribute()
      Saves the newly added instance of ActionAttributein the database corresponding to an existing Action instance referred by selectedAction
      void saveAddActionAttributeValue()
      Saves the newly added instance of ActAttrValuesin the database corresponding to an existing ActionAttribute instance referred by selectedActionAttributes
      void saveUpdateAction()
      Saves the updated value of selectedAction property in the database.
      void saveUpdateActionAttribute()
      Saves the updated value of selectedActionAttributes property in the database.
      void saveUpdateActionAttributeValue()
      Saves the updated value of selectedActionAttributeValue property in the database.
      void setActionAttributeList(java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActionAttribute> actionAttributeList)
      Sets the actionAttributeList property to ActionAttribute argument.
      void setActionAttributeValueList(java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActAttrValues> actionAttributeValueList)
      Sets the actionAttributeValueList property to ActAttrValues argument.
      void setActionList(java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Action> actionList)
      Sets the actionList property to Action argument.

      Sets the attrbtn property to boolean argument.

      Sets the attrValuebtn property to boolean argument.

      Sets the daoActionAttributeValue property to ActAttrValuesDAO argument.

      Sets the newAttributeName property to String argument.

      Sets the newAttributeValue property to String argument.

      Sets the operationFail property to boolean argument.

      Sets the selectedAction property to Action argument.

      Sets the selectedDataType property to String argument
      void showAddMessage()
      Displays a message inside a Primefaces growl component in case of successful add operation.
      void showUpdateMessage()
      Displays a message inside a Primefaces growl component in case of successful update operation.
      void updateAction()
      Opens the /System Learning/Action/Update/UpdateActionDialog.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of updating the name and description of an existing Action instance.
      void updateActionAttribute()
      Opens the /System Learning/Action/Update/UpdateActionAttributeDialog.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of updating the existing ActionAttribute of an Action instance.
      void updateActionAttributeValue()
      Opens the /System Learning/Action/Update/UpdateActionAttributeValueDialog.xhtml file in a Primefaces Dialog component which offers the functionality of updating the value of an existing @ ActAttrValues corresponding to an @{code ActionAttribute} of an Action instance.

    • Field Detail

      • selectedAction

        public com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Action selectedAction
        An instance of Action used to store the Action selected by the user from the user interface.

      • actionList

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.Action> actionList
        An ArrayList of Action used to display all the existing Actions stored in the database.

      • actionAttributeList

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActionAttribute> actionAttributeList
        An ArrayList of ActionAttribute used to display all the existing ActionAttribute(s) stored in the database. These ActionAttribute(s) are related to a particular Action instance stored in selectedAction.

      • selectedActionAttributes

        public com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActionAttribute selectedActionAttributes
        An instance of ActionAttribute used to store the ActionAttribute selected by the user from the user interface.

      • actionAttributeValueList

        public java.util.ArrayList<com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActAttrValues> actionAttributeValueList
        An ArrayList of ActAttrValues used to display all the existing ActAttrValues(s) stored in the database. These ActAttrValues(s) are related to a particular ActionAttribute instance stored in selectedActionAttributes.

      • selectedActionAttributeValue

        public com.aislab.accesscontrol.core.entities.ActAttrValues selectedActionAttributeValue
        An instance of ActAttrValues used to store the ActAttrValues selected by the user from the user interface.

        public void updateAction()
